Lead.title: Lead
Lead.description: Represents a potential customer who has submitted a contact form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Lead entity.

email.description: The email address of the lead.

phone.description: The phone number of the lead.

message.description: The message or query submitted by the lead.

submissionDate.description: The date and time when the lead submitted the form.

Testimonial.title: Testimonial
Testimonial.description: Represents a customer testimonial displayed on the landing page.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Testimonial entity.

customerName.description: The name of the customer who provided the testimonial.

customerTitle.description: The title or role of the customer.

testimonialText.description: The text content of the testimonial.

rating.description: The rating given by the customer (e.g., on a scale of 1 to 5).

displayOrder.description: The order in which the testimonial should be displayed on the page.

isVisible.description: Indicates whether the testimonial is currently visible on the landing page.

PricingPlan.title: PricingPlan
PricingPlan.description: Represents a pricing plan for the vehicle tracking service.

id.description: Unique identifier for the PricingPlan entity.

name.description: The name of the pricing plan (e.g., Basic, Premium).

description.description: A description of the features included in the pricing plan.

price.description: The price of the pricing plan.

currency.description: The currency of the price (e.g., USD, EUR).

billingFrequency.description: How often the plan is billed (e.g., Monthly, Annually).

features.description: A list of features included in the pricing plan.

displayOrder.description: The order in which the pricing plan should be displayed on the page.

isVisible.description: Indicates whether the pricing plan is currently visible on the landing page.

firestore.reasoning:
This Firestore data structure is designed to support the CarLock landing page application, focusing on leads, testimonials, and pricing plans. It prioritizes simplicity and security. Leads are stored in a flat collection for easy access. Testimonials and Pricing Plans are stored in their own collections to allow for independent management and querying.

**Authorization Independence:** There is no authorization required for leads. Testimonials and Pricing Plans will likely be managed by admin users through a separate CMS, so we are not including user-based security rules for them right now.

**QAPs:** The structure supports listing all testimonials and pricing plans, allowing for easy display on the landing page.
